question: Which of the following does not explain the debate surrounding cultural relativism?

answers.text: An anthropologist practices cultural relativism as a means to understand all people without bias; it is a means that crosses all cultural and socioeconomic boundaries.
The 1948 Universal Declaration of Human Rights has raised the question as to whether everything in a culture can be acceptedâ€”especially if it violates human rights.
The debate centers on the question of whether there are any boundaries to cultural relativism.
The idea of cultural relativism 2.0, which is a modified form of cultural relativism, proposes that one should first give people a chance.
